abstract: On the back of record profit so far this year, Goldman Sachs is starting a donor-driven philanthropy fund that aims to reach $1 billion over the next few years.
snippet: On the back of record profit so far this year, Goldman Sachs is starting a donor-driven philanthropy fund that aims to reach $1 billion over the next few years.
lead_paragraph: On the back of record profit so far this year, Goldman Sachs, the global investment bank, is starting a donor-driven philanthropy fund that aims to reach $1 billion over the next few years.

headline.main: Goldman Sachs Starts Drive to Build Philanthropy Fund
headline.print_headline: Goldman Sachs Starts Employee Drive to Build Billion-Dollar Philanthropy Fund
